description:
"You've never been fucked by another guy?" I asked Nicolas. I still can't believe it.

"Nope. This will be my first time."

"Really?" I repeat.

"Yeah."

Ford was sitting next to him.

"Homey, that probably just means you're nice and tight," he joked.

"You didn't see his first video!" I said to Ford. I honestly don't think he had.

"My girlfriend saw it," Nicolas added. "She liked it."

I doubt that Nicolas was thinking much about her while Ford was pounding his hairy ass.

"So how was it? How did his asshole feel?" I asked Ford afterward.

"It was actually pretty tight. It felt good..."
title: Nicolas & Ford
